title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 87 - Nursing Home Company And Hospital Mortgage Loans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 87 - Nursing Home Company And Hospital Mortgage Loans

State Regulations

Nursing Home Companies (§ 87.1 to 87.14)

Mortgage Loan Charges (§ 87.20 to 87.22)

Hospital Mortgage Loans (§ 87.30 to 87.40)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 87

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§2862, 2867, 2868, 2878, 2880, 2881;Public Authorities Law, §§2976-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
